channel.title: News Publisher
channel.description: Read our awesome news, every day.

item.title: This is an Instant Article
item.author: Mr. Author
item.description: This is my first Instant Article. How awesome is this?
item.content:encoded:
<!doctype html> <html lang="en" prefix="op: http://media.facebook.com/op#"> <head> <meta charset="utf-8"> <link rel="canonical" href="http://example.com/article.html"> <meta property="op:markup_version" content="v1.0"> </head> <body> <article> <header> <!— Article header goes here --> </header>
<!— Article body goes here -->
<footer> <!— Article footer goes here --> </footer> </article> </body> </html>
